entry.title: PR Average workflow time issue
entry.content:
How to resolve the error with the "PR Average approval time (Flexible workflow)" app in the P-System. - Upon opening the app, the error "Loading chart data failed. An exception was raised No valid conversion rate could be determined by the database Database returned the SQL code 719.

entry.title: SAP Cloud ERP - Scope Item duplicated in more than 1 line of business/ Business area
entry.content:
Hi Team,

In SAP Cloud ERP (Public Cloud), certain scope items are duplicated across Line of Business/Business Area.

Please find below an example of scope item 7DW Lot Size of One based on Make to Order, which is appearing 13 times across Line of Business/Business Area as below. There are about 129 Scope items which are duplicated in 2508_DE list. This results in redundancy of scope items as part of Project scoping as well as delivery.

Can someone from SAP help to address this issue? In case if its not possible to remove duplicacy, can SAP mark LOB/Business Area with some identification (like *), so unique scope items can be identified.

Additional example of scope item 54V Produce and Sell Standard Products – Warehouse Managed which is appearing in 11 Line of Business/Business Area.

 Additional example of scope item 33Q Actual Costing which is appearing in Business Area Cost Management and Profitability Analysis which is correct, while it is also appearing in Business Area Accounting and Financial Close, which seems to be incorrect.

 Regards

Sandeep

entry.title: CDS View in SAP Public Cloud for Settlement Rule in WBS/Project
entry.content:
Hi Team,

Is there any standard CDS view available in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud that can help us view the Settlement Rule maintained in WBS Element/Project?

Requirement:
We need a logic to check the WBS element’s settlement rule to verify if an Asset Under Construction (AUC) is already created before proceeding further.

Has anyone implemented this or knows which CDS views or APIs can be leveraged for this scenario? Any suggestions or best practices would be greatly appreciated.

Regards,

Gunadharshini

entry.title: No edocument created in ecockpit (SAP Public Cloud)
entry.content:
Dear Everyone,

No eDocuments available in edocumetn cockpit, in SAP Public cloud.

I have posted the billing docuemnt XXXX for company Belgium company and Customer has Belgium VAT number in identification and all the neccary configuration has been created inthe system, but still no edocument genreated. Do any face this problem?

SAP Document and Reporting Compliance SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 

Regards

Janarthanan

entry.title: CDS VIEW About Credit Exposure
entry.content:
在公有云环境中，是否有某个公开的 CDS View 可以获取到所有信用敞口类别（100/200/300/400/500）对应的信用敞口金额？


目前我们只找到了 I_CreditExposureItem，但它仅能获取到100（未清订单）和400（交货敞口）类别的金额，缺少200（应收账款未清项）、300（特殊敞口）等类别。


另外也查看了 CDS View：I_CreditLimitUtilization，其中虽有信用敞口相关字段，但也存在同样的问题——其汇总金额仅包含100和400类别，并非全部敞口类别的总额。

 

这与前台应用（如“显示信用敞口”和“管理信用账户”）中显示的信用敞口金额不一致，可能导致信用风险监控不准确或决策依据不完整。

entry.title: Why cant I create a PO from my PR is "Process purchase requisitions"? (BD3)
entry.content:
The errors that I get are: 

Currency and Net price are filled.
It does work however using the old app Create purchase orders - advanced.

Does anyone have a solution?

entry.title: Error message 5XU DRC Germany
entry.content:
Hi dear community,

after setting up the Scope Item 5XU for E-Invoice Germany, I get the following message during testing: Proxy error SOAP:1007 SRT: Unsupported xstream found: (“HTTP C: ode 401 : Unauthorized”) Execution failed; see further messages for details. Error triggers message; details can be found in the interface log.

The configuration has been compared with other systems where it works perfectly, but it still doesn't work. In addition, the configuration is very similar to the blog post here:  Electronic Invoicing in SAP S/4HANA Cloud, public edition

Can anyone help me with how to deal with this error message?

BR

Matze

 

 

Log:

entry.title: Add restriction when logging to SAP Public Cloud
entry.content:
Are there ways in restricting access to SAP Public Cloud using VPN or through IP Address?

Client would like to make sure that their users can access SAP Public Cloud using their company network.

entry.title: Restrict Consumption of raw material from specific store in co11n
entry.content:
I have a query, a system restriction is required to prevent material consumption from the specific storage location “Store” during production confirmations in transaction CO11N. At present, users can consume stock from all storage locations, including “Store,” which leads to incorrect inventory postings and stock discrepancies.

is there any solution through which system block or restrict this specific storage location so that users are not able to issue or consume materials from “Store” during CO11N confirmations.

entry.title: Automatic Task creation for production posting changes documents in SAP Public Cloud WM
entry.content:
Hi,

Is it possible to schedule a warehouse task creation job for for production posting changes documents? I have tested /SCWM/R_DLV_PDO_CREATE_WT_JT but it seem to pick only outbound deliveries (PDO)? Not posting changes for production supply.

entry.title: Is Intercompany Asset Transfer Across Different Countries Supported in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud ?
entry.content:
When we try to execute the transfer using the standard app, we receive the error:

FAA_POST303 – “Transfer not possible as company code XXXX and YYYY are in different countries/regions.”

I checked the available documentation and could not find any explicit SAP Note or official statement confirming whether cross-country intercompany asset transfers are supported or not in Public Cloud.

entry.title: Can the S4/HANA Public Cloud Updates overwrite my Customizing without Z or Y?
entry.content:
we have to extend some entries in IMG, e.g. the valuation classes to implement the material account determination according our customers requirement. Ideally we can do it by using the same primary keys as we have on another SAP system the customers runs. There the primary keys are fully numeric. We have concerns to follow the same nomenclature in public cloud. Will IMG entries which don’t start with Z or Y be overwritten by future updates, in the case SAP will release new standard entries which are congruent to the entries we set up.

In on premise systems you can check through the delivery class of tables by yourself. There you can identify if the table is protected against SAP updates or if you have to protect your entries by using the Z/Y namespace.

Generally we want to prevent that updates will overwrite entries we will do when customize the system.

entry.title: The Detail of Service Contract cannot Display
entry.content:
Hi Dears
I want to check the detail of date rules (ZCONT007). We have written the logic in it. 
When I pressed the details button, the popup message appeared below.
Then I pressed continue button, the detail of date rules cannot display. 
Is there anyone know the reason?

SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 
#Service Contract 
@Wei

entry.title: Hide company code by default
entry.content:
Hi all,
we need a company code in our SAP public cloud system, which should be by default not be seen by anyone. Only to some users, for which we would create additonal roles where needed. Alternative option would be to create additional roles and restrict one to not see the company code, and allow the other role to see it. But that sounds like many roles to be duplicated across the system. Any idea how to handle that?

Many thanks
Tobias

entry.title: Copy Text from Sevrice Order to Billing Document
entry.content:
Hi SAP Experts,

I am working with SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Service 
 
I would like to transfer a text object from the Service Order to the corresponding billing document (e.g. billing information for the customer). Which text type is not relevant, currently NO texts are copied/transferred (from my understanding)

Important: the text I want to maintain is only known AFTER creating a service confirmation.

Do you have an idea how to realize this (without custom fields?)

BR
Simon

entry.title: Add New Condition Types and Account Keys in Existing Tax Procedure in SAP S4HANA Public Cloud.
entry.content:
Dear SAP,

We have raise a ticket with the reference of  ticket number - 1415730.

 

 Subject: Unable to Add New Condition Types and Account Keys in Existing Tax Procedure

Required: we want to add the New condition types and Account keys in Tax procedure

Issue: We need to add new condition types and account keys to our existing tax procedure. However, the system is not allowing us to create new entries. The procedure appears in edit mode, but the New Entries option is disabled and the fields remain locked.

Request:
Please assist in enabling the New Entries option for adding condition types and account keys in the tax procedure, or provide the necessary corrections so that we can update the configuration.

Please find the attached file for your reference.

 

Regards.

Asma shaik

entry.title: SAP_BR_PROJECT_MANAGER_PROF be in "Business Role Template"
entry.content:
Hi All

I activated scope item Internal Project Management – Project-Based Services (1A8) and Customer Project Management – Project-Based Services (J11).
I tried to find SAP_BR_PROJECT_MANAGER_PROF in "Business Role Template" to assign a business role, but I couldn't find it.
If I activate the scope item above, shouldn't SAP_BR_PROJECT_MANAGER_PROF be in "Business Role Template"?

Thank you

entry.title: How many industries, countries/regions, and languages ​​does SAP S/4HANA Cloud support?
entry.content:
Hi Expert

How many industries, countries/regions, and languages ​​does SAP S/4HANA Cloud support?
Is it correct that the Private Edition supports 25 industries, 64 countries/regions, and 39 languages?
How many of each does the Public Edition support?

BR
Takashi
